amendment.description: Amendment redirects $21 million from the Operation and Maintenance Account, Defense-Wide to the National Guard Youth ChalleNGe Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect funds in the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $21,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. McKinley.
